sentences.en: All shades of mauve, lilac, lavender and purple were fashionable.
sentences.cn: 深深浅浅的各种木槿色、丁香色、熏衣草色和紫色都是流行色。

sentences.en: Chelsea Harbour is renowned for its fashionable restaurants.
sentences.cn: 切尔西港以高档餐馆闻名。

sentences.en: Entrepreneurs developed fashionable restaurants and bars in the area.
sentences.cn: 实业家在这一地区建起了许多时尚的餐馆和酒吧。

sentences.en: It's becoming fashionable to have long hair again.
sentences.cn: 现在又开始流行蓄长发了。

sentences.en: It's fashionable but wearable, and it's easy to look after.
sentences.cn: 它既时尚又耐穿，而且容易打理。

sentences.en: Nowadays, everyone in the city was very clothes - conscious and fashionable.
sentences.cn: 现在城里人很讲究穿而且穿得很时髦.

sentences.en: Officials tussled over who had responsibility for the newly fashionable unemployment agenda.
sentences.cn: 众官员为谁负责最近备受关注的失业议题一事争得不可开交。

sentences.en: One - piece swimming costumes are more fashionable than bikinis.
sentences.cn: 连体游泳衣比比基尼泳衣更流行.

sentences.en: Our clothes are lightweight, fashionable, practical for holidays.
sentences.cn: 我们的服装轻便、时尚，并且很适合度假时穿。

sentences.en: Radical feminism is currently the fashionable topic among the chattering classes.
sentences.cn: 激进的女权主义是时下名嘴阶层热议的话题。

sentences.en: She wears a fashionable hair style prevailing in the city.
sentences.cn: 她的发型是这个城市流行的款式.

sentences.en: Strong colours are very fashionable at the moment.
The fashionable remarks of today often become the commonplace expressions of tomorrow.
sentences.cn: 今天的时髦话往往变成明天的陈词滥调.

sentences.en: Washed - out jeans were very fashionable at that time.
sentences.cn: 那时退色牛仔裤很时髦.

sentences.en: We ate at a fashionable new restaurant.
sentences.cn: 我们在一家新开张的时尚餐馆吃饭.

sentences.en: We lunched in a fashionable restaurant.
sentences.cn: 我们在一家上等的饭店吃午餐.

words.tran_cn: 时尚；时装；样式；时髦人物
创流行的人；赶时髦的人

trans.tran_cn: 流行的，时髦人物使用的，（尤指）有钱人常光顾的
trans.tran_en: popular, especially for a short period of time
